data.title: There's More To Discover
data.meta_description: Perhaps it starts with an inspiring sunrise on the Canadian side of the St. Lawrence Seaway or ends with a breathtaking sunset from the U.S.
data.text:
Perhaps it starts with an inspiring sunrise on the Canadian side of the St. Lawrence Seaway or ends with a breathtaking sunset from the U.S. Maybe it includes views of storybook castles, a good fish story, a taste of craft beverages or a trip back in time. On the pristine waters or in quiet villages, there are thousands of things to see and do.

Weddings

The 1000 Islands is home to one of the most inspiring love stories ever told. Bring your story, your inspiration, your passion to life here. The 1000 Islands exudes romance and is long time favorite place to exchange wedding vows, renew your commitment to each other or enjoy a memorable honeymoon or milestone anniversary.

Learn More About Weddings

Meetings & Conferences

The Thousand Islands Region on the St. Lawrence River and Eastern Lake Ontario areas combine to offer the perfect blend of business and pleasure. From waterfront resorts in villages such as Clayton, Sackets Harbor and Alexandria Bay, to national brand hotels in Watertown, NY, the region offers a variety of meeting, conference and convention venues.

Learn More About Meetings & Conferences
